title: "Color / Moire" Portfolio Title Page
medium: Letterpress in black ink on heavy off-white wove paper
description:
Imprinted in narrow column down middle of sheet: COLOR /  MOIRE  / by Albert Gregory / Cambridge, Massachusetts / 1969 / This is 23 [number added by hand in black ink] of 100 copies.
Publication information from colophon page 1999-6-6-27: Prepared and printed in 1968-1969 by Atlantic Typographers, Boston, Massachusetts, handset Univers (65) type; handmixed colors from Sinclair (Secaucus, NJ) and Valentine, Inc.; printed on 140' Mohawk Poseidon Bristol paper (Mohawk Paper Company, Cohoes, NY).
name: text page
